content: front piece when you lay the front piece with the right side facing you and the straps up this is the strap on the right side watch video tutorial purl one row now work increases to shape the neckline row 1 rs k to last 2 sts m1r k2 row 2 ws purl to the end row 3 rs k to the end row 4 ws purl to the end row 5 rs k to last 2 sts m1r k2 row 6 ws purl to the end repeat row 1 to 6 a total of 3 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 times there are now 10 12 12 12 14 15 17 18 20 sts on the needle do not cut the yarn 5 ©pinkforme join the back pieces now both parts are joined together the next row is a rs row knit across the left back piece cast on 19 19 21 22 23 26 28 32 36 sts using the backwards loop cast-on method knit across the right back piece watch video tutorial you now have 39 43 45 46 51 56 62 68 76 sts on the needle purl one row then knit 20 18 22 22 20 24 22 26 24 row in st st now work increases for the armholes row 1 rs k2 m1l knit to last 2 sts m1r k2 row 2 ws purl to the end repeat row 1-2 a total of 10 10 10 12 12 13 14 15 15 times 20 20 20 20 24 24 26 28 30 30 sts increased there are now 59 63 65 70 75 82 90 98 106 sts on the needle join back and front pieces knit across the back piece cast on 6 8 10 11 12 12 14 16 18 sts underarm using the backwards loop cast-on method knit across the front piece cast on 3 4 5 6 6 6 7 8 9 sts underarm using the backwards loop cast-on method place a bor-m cast on 3 4 5 5 6 6 7 8 9 sts underarm using the backwards loop cast-on method you now have 130 142 150 162 174 188 208 228 sts on the needle body knit in stockinette stitch until the work measures approximately 18 20 21 23 25 28 31 35 38 cm 7 7 8 8 9 9 8 11 12 2 13 7 14 9 under the armhole or to your desired length body hem change to 3 mm us2 5 circular needle and work *k1 tbl p1* ribbing until the hem measures 3 cm / 1 18 in total bobble all sts using the italian bind-off method or your preferred stretchy bind-off method 6 ©pinkforme neckline change to 3 mm us2 5 circular needle and work *k1 tbl p1* ribbing until the hem measures 1 cm / 0 39 in total bobble all sts using the italian bind-off method or your preferred stretchy bind-off method begin at the center
